thread.section_title: Hotel Elysees Union - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming
thread.title_full: Charming - Review of Hotel Elysees Union, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JENNIFER F
title: Charming
text: Good location (close to key attractions and transportation) and charming little room. Great if you are out and about a lot and won't spend too much time indoors. (Our particular room was rather small, albeit very comfortable, clean, and charming.) No complaints. Market only several yards from hotel. Very convenient! Also, superb coffee shop with lovely pastries only a few short blocks away. Would definitely look into booking again in the future.
